ResourceHeader.ResourceName: AIM/SOFIE daily plots, parameters vs.alt. & long., etc. (L3 Summary data)
ResourceHeader.Description:
This SOFIE (Solar Occultation for Ice Experiment) data set contains color-coded pairs of
daily plots of several physical parameters vs altitude and longitude.  
Parameters include temperature, mixing ratios for H2O, O3 and CH4, and 
ice mass.  Members of each pair are for the northern and southern
hemispheres.  The interface also supports plotting of lower level
data.

InformationURL.Name: Info interface page at Hampton U.

AccessURL.Name: Data interface page at GATS, Inc.
